titles.title: A bill to repeal title II of the REAL ID Act of 2005 in order to safeguard civil liberties and individual privacy.
A bill to repeal title II of the REAL ID Act of 2005 in order to safeguard civil liberties and individual privacy.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
